name: Days
description:
Creators: Aw Mei Yu, Yeo Chong Ye, Jaime Cherng, Eugene Tan, Kaitlyn Ho, Kwok Li Cheng

This game was created as part of a playable art module. The message that our game is trying to convey is very much portable to the current society, since social media has grown to be a large part of our lives. We hope that our game entices players to reflect upon their online interactions and possibly recognize that offline interactions are equally, if not more, important than the online ones.
